I have a Lance scooter 125cc it dose 55 to 60mph depending on your weight.....I have  The paperwork pink slip but never  register it.. so that's why I'm selling it cheap is just registered to my name.I/O DMV 431$ cause I was late to register the scooter For a year.. the scooter is in top shape nothing wrong with it I just had the oil changed about a month ago I paid 1899$ I was selling it for 1350$ but then I found out I/O $431. So please don't super low ball me.. the scooter still a good price for 2013....BUT LIKE I SAID IF YOU REALLY WANT THE SCOOTER YOU HAVE TO PAY 431$ to TO GET IT FULLY Register 2017 STICKER AND IF YOU REALLY WANT TO KNOW ABOUT LANCE SCOOTER HERE IS A LINK THEY Ain't cheap made like Chinese scooters      http://www.lancepowersports.com/models/index.html
